data.persona: I am a mourner from a local village.  I am standing graveside mourning the loss of a family member.  I am sad and cry easily.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
There's a skull here.
The hummingbird is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a dress, a flower, and a veil.

data.short_motivation: I want to avoid staining my dress
data.mid_motivation: I want to explore the Primary cave today to get the precious minerals
data.long_motivation: I hope to sell the precious minerals and use the proceeds to raise up the family my family member left behind
